import React from 'react' const Addpoll = ({newPoll, setNewPoll, handleSubmit}) => { const myNewPoll = { id: 0, question : '', image : '', results : [0,0,0], options : ['', '', ''] } return (
setNewPoll(newPoll => ({...newPoll,question: e.target.value}))} />
setNewPoll(newPoll => ({...newPoll,image: e.target.value}))} />
setNewPoll(newPoll => ({...newPoll,options: newPoll.options[0]+ e.target.value}))} />
) } export default Addpoll;
